Topic.Title: Updating a Quest Game Created ONLINE

Posts.EditableText: I have been working with the online version of Quest since I currently have Ubuntu installed on my old laptop. I just want to know if I can publish a game I created and still come back later to fix it? I want to be able to update it later in case I missed any mistakes.
Posts.HTML: I have been working with the online version of Quest since I currently have Ubuntu installed on my old laptop. I just want to know if I can publish a game I created and still come back later to fix it? I want to be able to update it later in case I missed any mistakes.
